about_license: An yi lasisi a ƙarƙashin AGPL-3.0
about_free:
Wannan manhajar a bude take ga kowa, kuma kyauta ce, bata zuwa da garanti.
Kuyi amfani da ita a haɗarin ku.
about_data_protection:
Manhajar nan tana kiyaye bayananku da sirrin ku gwargwadon iko.
Manhajar tana adana duk muhimman bayanai akan na'urarku.
Babu shirin-komfuta mai bin didigi ko saka tallace-tallace a ciki.
about_data_declaration: Duba Bangaren Sirri da Kariyar Bayanai
about_foundation_button: Ƙarin bayani game da Sumcoin Foundation
about_help_or_feedback: Shin Kuna buƙatar taimako ko kuna son bayar da ra'ayi?
about_translate: Zaku iya taimakawa wajen fassara wannan manhajar akan Sumcoin Weblate.
about_illustrations: Bayanin yadda ake saitawa, godiya ga
addressbook_dialog_remove_title: Shin kanaso ka cire wannan adireshin da gaske?
app_settings_biometrics: Bada izinin tabbatar da zanen hannu
about_foundation: Gidauniyar Sumcoin ce take tallafawa wannan aikin da kuɗi. Da fatan zaku bada gudummowar kudi ga gidauniyar don ta cigaba da haɓaka wannan manhajar.
addressbook_export_dialog_description:
Wannan key din yana ba da cikakkiyar dama ga tsabar kuɗin da aka adana acikin wannan adireshin. 
Kar ku fadawa kowa key ɗinku 
A cigaba idan an san abinda ake shirin yi.
app_settings_default_description: .Default wallet zata fito da kanta idan aka bude manhajar
app_settings_language_restart: Ana buƙatar a sake kunna manhajar.
setup_import_note: Saka seed din da ake so a shigo da shi. Wannan daban yake da private key.
setup_securebox_fail:
Kuyi hakuri.
Na'urarku ba ta da cikakken tsaro don ajjiye keys.
setup_text1: Idan kun riga kun ƙirƙiri walet kuma har yanzu kuna da seed phrase dinku, to ku zaɓi
setup_save_text1: Wadannan kalmomi masu zuwa su ake kira Seed. kalmar sirri wacce za ta ba da cikakkiyar dama ga walet ɗin ku da duk coins dinku.
tx_rejected: .Hanyar sadarwa ta katse cinikin. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
wallet_receive_label_hint: Danna maɓallin Share zai adana alamar adireshin.
store_description:
Aika da karɓar Sumcoin, majagaba na Hujja-na-Stake, akan wayarka.

A kiyaye irin walat ɗin ku.
Wannan app yana zuwa ba tare da cikakken garanti ba.
Yi amfani da haɗarin kansa.

Siffofin:
- Dangane da ka'idar electrum.
- Aika da karɓar sumcoin.
- Shirye don yin ma'amala bayan shigarwa (ba jira).
- Sumcoin da Sumcoin testnet walat.
- Gudanar da littafin adireshi.
- Shigo da wallet ɗin takarda.
- Shigo da fitarwa maɓallan sirri (WIF).
- Gudanarwar uwar garke.
- Tallafin harsuna da yawa.
- Sanarwa na bango.

Ana iya samun iyakokin da aka sani a ma'ajiyar Github.
app_settings_newWallet: Ana buƙatar a shigar da sabuwar walet
app_settings_notifications_alert_content:
Wannan zai kunna sanarwar game da bayanan sirrin mu.
Ana iya kashewa a kowane lokaci.
app_settings_notifications_hint_sync_2: Alamomi: Za’a iya samun jinkirin zuwan sanarwar, gwargwadon yadda na’urar ka take aiki a bayan fage. Na'urorin iOS na iya tsammanin dogon jinkirin.
app_settings_sendTransaction: Ana bukata kafin a aika ciniki
app_settings_walletList: Ana bukata wajan jera lis din walet
authenticate_confirm_title_new: Sake saka sabuwar PIN din ka
authenticate_retry_warning_title: Gargadi, saura sake gwadawa ɗaya tarage.
authenticate_subtitle_plural: retriesLeft gwajin da ya rage a gabadaya$
buy_peercoin_dialog_content: Ma'aikatan wannan manhajar ba su da alhakin abubuwan da ke cikin sa.
import_wif_alert_content:
Kun tabbatar cewa kuna son ku shigo da adireshin mai zuwa:

$address
import_wif_error_snack: An riga an shigo da wannan adireshin
import_wif_intro:
Saka private key din da ake son a shigo da shi.
Akwai buƙatar zama a tsarin WIF.
import_wif_success_snack: Anyi nasarar shigo da private key
no_new_wallet: Babu sabbin walet a halin yanzu.
paperwallet_step_4_text: Cire komai daga cikin walet sai ka shigo da kaya
receive_requested_amount: Adadin da ake nema (ba dole bane)
send_amount_below_minimum_unable:
Mafi ƙarancin fitarwa shine $amount.
Ba ku da isassun kuɗi da zaku biya.
server_add_no_port: Dole ne ya ƙunshi port, misali. : 50004
server_add_server_exists: Yaki yi: An riga an saka wannan server.
server_add_server_wrong_genesis:
Genesis hash beyi daidai ba.
Wannan server bata karbar coin.
server_settings_alert_generated_title: ?Shin da gaske ana so a cire wannan server
server_settings_error_no_server_left: Ana buƙatar aƙalla server ɗaya da za'a iya jonawa!
setup_pin: A saita PIN kafin a ci gaba.
setup_pin_no_biometrics: Na'urarku ba ta tantance zanen ‘yan yatsu.
setup_price_feed_description: Wannan zai ba da damar nuna balans din wallet dinka a ainihin kudin chanji kai tsaye.
setup_bg_sync_description: Wannan zai ba walet damar sanarwar bayan fage.
app_settings_description:
Waɗannan log din sun ƙunshi muhimman bayanai.
.Duda cewa basu kunshi private key ba, ku kula da wadanda zasu iya ganin logs dinku
app_settings_notifications_hint_sync_1:
Saita tazarar da manhaja za take bincika ko an sami sabbin ciniki.
.Tazarar aiki: $minutes mintuna
app_settings_price_alert_content:
Wannan zai kunna bayanan farashin mu na sirri.
Ana iya kashewa a kowane lokaci.
authenticate_retry_warning_text: Manhajar zata kulle kanta kuma za'a iya budeta da ingantaccen tabbaci.
authenticate_subtitle_singular: retriesLeft gwajin da ya rage a gabadaya$
buy_peercoin_dialog_title: Yanzu za a tura ku zuwa shafin yanar gizon abokan huldar mu.
import_seed_error_1: Dole ne ya zama kalmomi 12 ko yafi
import_wif_error_failed_parse: Private key dinka ba mai inganci bane. Ko a tsarin WIF yake?
import_wif_hint: Dole ne a sake shigo da key din ayayin da akai restoring walet daga seed. Ba a haɗa shi da seed ba.
paperwallet_error_1:
Babu komai a walet
ko adadin yayi ƙasa da wanda ake fitarwa
paperwallet_success:
An yi nasarar shigo da paper Walet.
Ciniki zai bayyana nan ba da jimawa ba.
receive_website_description: Kuna iya siyan Sumcoin kai tsaye da katin banki (iya wanda ba ‘yan Amurka ba) ko daga wasu hanyoyin exchnages.
receive_website_faucet: Kuna iya karɓar free testnet coins akan wannan faucet din.
send_amount_below_minimum:
Mafi ƙarancin fitarwa shine $amount. 
Da fatan za a zaɓi adadi mafi girma ko daidai da shi.
send_oops: Wani abu ya faru, da fatan za a sake gwadawa
server_add_no_wss:
//:Dole ne a fara da wss
Sauran protocol basayi a halin yanzu
server_settings_alert_hardcoded_content: Ba'a iya goge hard coded serves , saidai ka kashe su.
setup_continue_alert_content:
A tabbatar an adana seed phrase.
Kuna iya samun sa daga baya a cikin saitin manhaja.
setup_price_feed_allow: Bada izini Ga Price Feed API
setup_bg_sync_allow: Bada izini ga sync API na bayan fage
wallet_value_alert_content:
Adana adadin coins dinnan a walet din wayar hannu na da hatsari.
 Zai fi ku kwashe coins dinku zuwa Stakebox, ko Ledger hardware wallet ko cold wallet.
store_short: Walet din hannu don Sumcoin da Sumcoin testnets.
send_dust_hint: Za a lalata ƙurar ma'amala kuma za a ƙidaya zuwa kudade.
